TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase

Docs.summary: Provides a host for workflows. Supports features like messaging activities, multi-instancing, and configuration.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the WorkflowServiceHost class.
[!code-cs[SendReceiveParameters#03](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/echoworkflowservice/program.cs#03)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription CreateDescription (out System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> implementedContracts);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription CreateDescription(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, class System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> implementedContracts) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of key/value pairs that contains the contract description for the hosted workflow service.
Docs.summary: Creates a service description of the hosted workflow service using the specified key/value pair collection of address, binding, contract and behavior service endpoint information.
Docs.returns: A service for the hosted workflow service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Override this method to control how the service description of the hosted workflow service is created.

Docs.value: A service for the hosted workflow service.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IAsyncResult OnBeginClose (TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult OnBeginClose(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The period of time the asynchronous close operation has to complete before timing out.
The asynchronous callback delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
User-define state data that is associated with the asynchronous close operation.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation invoked when the workflow service host is closed.
Docs.returns: A reference to the asynchronous close operation.
Docs.value: A reference to the asynchronous close operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnClose (TimeSpan timeout);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClose(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed

Docs.param: The period of time the close operation has to complete before timing out.
Docs.summary: Closes down the hosted service, including the channel dispatchers and associated instance contexts and listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The workflow runtime will try to persist any hosted workflow when OnClose is called, but persistence is not guaranteed in this scenario. If important business data is being hosted, the instances should persist frequently (such as after each Send operation, or after an interval of time) to ensure that data is not lost.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnEndClose (IAsyncResult result);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEndClose(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: A reference to the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Completes an asynchronous operation invoked when the workflow service host is closed.
